posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
I guess I made that build in answer to someone's request... totally forgot about it. Still have it on my hard drive though.

Go cleric 15/Rogue 1/CoT 4 preepic to get 15 BAB and use DP's power to the fullest. Start at 1st lvl with rogue for extra skillpoints and early UMD. You might even go Cleric 14/Rogue 2 preepic. Hellball and one epic save booster might be swapped for two Great Str and so can EP and the other epic save booster for a grand total of +1 AB and +2 Dev Crit DC.

Anyhow, if you are looking into the epitome of buff and melee str based battle cleric with umd access then go no further than Cleric 26/Bard 4/RDD 10.

For vampire killing I'd actually look into a turner/caster cleric. Mass heal them right from the start and then finish them off with a firestorm.
